channel.title: Need help portforwarding
channel.description:
First off, I have firewall portforwarded ,
[img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/707/rspsportfw.png[/img]
I have my router portforwarded
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/1600/routerports.png[/img]
Heres a img. of my source running
[img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/9370/serverrun.png[/img]
now when i go to runelocus.com to add my server to the status page it says its offline :(

item.title: Need help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

Hm. Can you team viewer? Message me with your ID and Password. Also You don’t need make two separate portforward rules. Just make one and make it “Both” instead of “TCP” and “UDP”.

Read full topic
